ComicInfo.Summary:
Amelia Anderson - a "Cassandra" who can see terrible occurrences before they happen - decides to take drastic action to stop a disastrous event.
At the bar in The Library of Worlds, Dimitri meets the magic-using Mia for the first time. Together they encounter two powerful beings who are about to cause Wyn and Doctor Strange some serious problems.
